description: Multiplicity of maximal squarefree kernel numbers applied to C(n,k) coefficients.
example: for n=8, 9 or 10 the spectra of squarefree maximal divisors are {1,2,14,14,70,14,14,2,1},{1,3,6,42,42,42,42,6,3,1} and {1,10,15,30,210,42,30,15,10,1} resp. The maxima (70,42 and 210) occur 1,4 or 4 times. So a(8)=1,a(9)=4 and a(10)=2.
author: _Labos Elemer_
